web_snippets: Lou received a MS in Food Science and BS in Microbiology, both from Rutgers University, and has served as an Adjunct Professor at the Rutgers Business School.
Lou is a visionary. He is the engine behind Viatek and fuels its ability to continually bring new, affordable innovations to the retail market.
Dr. Boliang Lou is a co-founder, Chairman of the board and CEO of Pharmaron. Under his direction, Pharmaron has transformed from a chemistry service provider.
